clusters.name: Linear Organization
clusters.description: Plans characterized by a linear arrangement of main volumes with clear horizontal connections facilitating movement.

clusters.name: Centralized Hub
clusters.description: Plans featuring a central main volume surrounded by supporting functions and horizontal connections radiating outward.

clusters.name: Clustered Arrangement
clusters.description: Plans with multiple main volumes grouped in clusters, often with supporting functions interspersed among them.

clusters.name: Radial Configuration
clusters.description: Plans that exhibit a radial or circular arrangement of main volumes, promoting movement around a central point.

clusters.name: Irregular Layout
clusters.description: Plans with irregularly shaped main volumes and non-linear connections, emphasizing a more organic flow.

clusters.name: Grid-like Organization
clusters.description: Plans that follow a grid pattern with clear horizontal and vertical connections, ensuring efficient circulation.

clusters.name: L-Shaped Configuration
clusters.description: Plans featuring an L-shaped arrangement of main volumes, often with supporting functions along the edges.

clusters.name: Symmetrical Layout
clusters.description: Plans that exhibit symmetry in the arrangement of main volumes and supporting functions, promoting balance.
